Although you're correct that drinking pee is a fetish that would instantly turn almost everyone off. We don't find any of your bits of unsolicited advice helpful but only annoyance. Also, you claimed to have a civil discussion when you responded who I am with obscene language, told someone to shut up, and replied insensitively to Spatiya if the person suffers from schizophrenia. No way does it sound civil at all like you claim to. You're undoubtedly an immature and pathetic person.

@Detroid_NTR 4.0 Don’t know if you’re reading this but you are indeed being controlling and intolerant. I think you haven’t had much experience with doujins and fucked up kinks and forgive me for saying so you seem pretty immature. Granted, I’d agree many of the arguments you offered but you’re fundamentally wrong. There are billions of people and billions of kinks. Imagine if you met someone who likes piss drinking or has committed consensual incest - are you really going to make them a 15 minutes presentation on why they aren’t human, that they have some sort of condition, and that they should be in an institution. Ethically and morally speaking, you could be right that societal taboos on many kinks are needed but really - for 2d porn? nhentai is a rare private space where weird people can feel they are not judged and not alone and yet although real life has enough restrictions you want to restrict people’s ero fantasies too. If that’s not controlling idk what is.

@joster235... At some point, it might be true the author started into doujin drawing as a scape from their reality and/or as a way to vent what they wanted to see but were unable to find it in the pool of degeneracy doujins are. But once they start making money out of it, it stops being a hobby for self-pleasure and turns into a job. As a job, you have to fight and do what it sells. Even if his own personal tastes and style make a hit, he have to make money out of it to survive and the only way to do it is by selling what pleases the masses... Now, this is more an assumption of myself and should be taken with a grain of salt but nevertheless. Based on the author's artistic name, I dare to say  he wanted to hook up on the unstoppable money machine Shindol is so I guess he did actually made this doujin to gain top popularity among the doujin market, be popular... and make money.

TBH @Ⱥɾìҽʂ is in the wrong about the drinkin piss paraphilia. It is, by no means, a standard and gral fetish people are into. Do a Google Trends seach and compare between different types of paraphilias and you'll find Piss Drinking is one of the lowest in the raking. Hell, even Vore is higher in searches that piss drinking. Thereby,  you're incorrect in your posture implying the majority of people are into it, therefore; socially acceptable. It's a paraphillia and by definition, it means it "involves unusual and especially socially unacceptable sexual practices". Merriam Webster Dictionary.

@joster235 thanks for the info. However, there is no way that this is featured because it's popular. Nah, I think the way they operate it is like YouTube. They just pick and choose for half of them, and the other half, they actually feature the most trending videos/ doujins. The amount of comments and favourites speak volumes on that.

@Ⱥɾìҽʂ - You put majority in quotations, almost as if you're implying that the majority of the human population don't find drinking piss disgusting. Also, the reason for me doing this is because it's a featured doujin. You know, there are a lot of things wrong with this platform and the way it's handled, and the featured section is one of them. I'm just saying, it would be for the best if we were to filter out doujins like these and simply not put them in the featured section for having a subhuman delight. "Wow, subhuman? You're crazy for saying that!", well, no, not at all. As I said, drinking someone's pee is just-wow, I mean- really, how? Genuinely, hoe can anyone enjoy this? Ask your neighbor, your coworkers, your classmates, your teachers, your fucking boss and parents- you know, just- ask them if they think drinking someone else's pee is hot because, really, it's not even your own pee that you're drinking!- it's someone else's!! And it's crazy because, honestly, you got a really good story here. That's a nice ending and you really hit a home run with the foreshadowing. However, as previously said, you peed on the fun by adding that' scene in which only served to turn people away. Want to know where I'm getting this from? Well, loom at the amount of comments. Aside from my own, the amount of comments per hour is less than the other featured doujins... it's crazy because you got an alluring cover on tip of a featured doujin, yet very few comments and not a lot of praise. Hey man, don't worry, once again, I'm not trying to shit on your parade, but I'm merely giving advice.
Even crazier is the fact that you made them kiss immediately after the guy literally drank the girl's piss. What kind of fucked up shit is that?

Genuine question: Why? Why did you put that pissing part? What was the point of that? What was the reason behind that stupid scene? It's so out of place, so disgusting, and it completely broke, and will continue to break, many people's connection. Dude, I'm not hating on you or your work, but fuck! You really failed me here. I thought you really had something there, and then you fucking blew it! Poof! Just like that, you broke my god damn likenesses. I just don't understand why that had to be...? For fuck's sake, how many people do you know that have a pee fetish? It's like 1 out of 10,000! How many people despise that? 1 out of 10!! So you see, you only ended up losing more readers than what you gained by adding that scene. This sucks, man, it really does, and it's doujins like these that push me more and more to the idea that we need better restrictions and an overhaul for this site.
